description: get one specific luster engine queue by <type, name>

schema.description: 其日期和时间信息以 ISO 8601 格式表示， 例如：2023年1月1日为 2023-01-01。
资源信息，用于过滤结果。

ComponentType.description:
过滤资源的类型。取值：
- engine：通过引擎类型来过滤结果。
- queue：通过队列来过滤结果。
- cluster：展示整个集群结果。


如果不填写，默认展示整个集群信息。

ComponentName.description: 根据ComponentType来设置特定过滤条件，如ComponentType为queue，就可以指定特定队列名称来获取特定队列资源使用情况。

Description.example: Total vcore usage over time in seconds
Total memory usage over time in seconds

VcoreUtilization.description: 资源平均CPU使用率。同Linux Top的%CPU含义。

Description.example: Ratio of used vcore to total available cores
Ratio of used memory to total available memory
Growth ratio of virtual core usage in seconds per day

MemSecondsDayGrowthRatio.description: 资源内存使用总量日环比。

Description.example: Growth ratio of memory usage in seconds per day

ReadSize.description: 资源读取文件系统总量。

Description.example: Total cumulative size of data read in megabytes (MB)

WriteSize.description: 资源写入文件系统总量。

Description.example: Total cumulative size of data written in megabytes (MB)

400.errorMessage: Parameters that must not be used together. %s
The specified parameter %s is not valid.
The input parameter %s is invalid or out of range.
The input parameter %s that is mandatory for processing this request is not supplied.
You do not have permission to perform this action. %s
The request was denied due to request throttling. %s

500.errorMessage: The request processing has failed due to some unknown error, exception or failure.

503.errorMessage: The request has failed due to a temporary failure of %s service.
The request has failed due to a temporary failure of the server.

title: 获取集群单个资源使用结果
summary: 通过EMR Doctor获取集群单个资源使用结果。
